DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine Pitavastatin lower CoQ10 less Atorvastatin Rosuvastatin .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Comparing CoQ10 Levels While Taking 3 Different Statins
DOC.detailed_description: Statins know effectively treat high cholesterol heart disease . However , statin may lower endogenous level Coenzyme10 ( CoQ10 ) . This decrease CoQ10 level may responsible side effect myalgia . Previous study show Pitavastatin may affect CoQ10 level statin , still lower cholesterol . In study , investigator intend compare plasma level CoQ10 patient take 3 different FDA-approved statin , equipotent dos .
